DOC.brief_summary: The present trial perform evaluate whether SHR1020 combination docetaxel patient Local Advanced Metastatic recurrent Non Squamous NSCLC effective compare placebo combination docetaxel . A secondary aim obtain safety information well information quality life patient treat SHR1020 combination docetaxel .
DOC.brief_title: SHR1020 Plus Docetaxel Compared Placebo Plus Docetaxel 2nd Line Non Squamous Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
